Package edu.sxccal.qrcodescanner

Provides classes to generate project specific QRCode in Android OS

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    About
    The about section of the app
    DecodeQR
    This module decodes a QRCode image and stores it in Decoded directory as "decoded.txt"
    GenQR
    Uses QR module to display the paths of the generated QRCode.png, sig and suepk files if successful else raises a Toast that displays the path to Log.txt
    ImgtoBW
    creates greyscale image
    Log
    Generate Log file and raise Toast
    QR
    Creates the QRCode image, digital signature and the public key
    QRCode
    This is the main activity
    Unzip
    Extracts zip file
    Verify
    This activity displays the verification result

Package edu.sxccal.qrcodescanner Description

Provides classes to generate project specific QRCode in Android OS
Since:
1.0
